rules.text: FOC + [reason]: Listen [3] to the wisdom of the elders to return a moment from your hand to your collection to choose a starting moment from your collection that you meet the aspect requirement for and add it to your hand. (This alteration to your deck is permanent.)
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
FOC + [connection]: Speak [2] with Jaris about your time in the Rangers to soothe 1 fatigue for every 2 effort. Then add an equal amount of [symbol] to Jaris.
If there is an exhausted predator, Jaris stirs up trouble. »» Ready that predator unless you discard 2[progress] from Jaris.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
If this being is attached to your role, it gains Persistent and the following test:
FIT + [connection]: Ride the long-limbed steed to add 2[progress] to a location or feature for every effort.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.

FOC + [connection]: Haggle [3] with the vendors of the market to return a gear from your hand to your collection to choose a starting gear from your collection that you meet the aspect requirement for and add it to your hand. (This alteration to your deck is permanent.)
